title: US Partnering Award: Systems Biology of Plants and Algae, from Molecular Networks to Informatics Infrastructure.
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Travel award, running less than 6 months.
findingsText: This is a travel award, we have done our first proposed visit from USA to UK. Other labs will use our solutions Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology
